info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
I myself a superhost in UK, this is my first time airbnb booking in Bangladesh, Dhaka. I have booked the place without not knowing the time it will take for me to travel to my destination each day, which was too inconvenient for me I have then requested a full refund from Kawser, he had fully refunded me even though it’ was my mistake.
Very honest host
Very helpful
Very friendly
Very trustworthy
If you’re coming from Abroad or ( Sylheti) this place is highly recommended for your peace of mind
